title: HOW DO I GET THE NEW LAUNCHER
body: how do u get the new launcher i have the old one and when the client switched over i still had the old launcher so i tried reinstalling but it still gave me the old launcher. now whenever i need to patch, it patches on the old launcher then on the new one.

replies.body: sooo when i start up league it takes me to a window that the old client had with the launch button at the top then it will  take me to the new login screen. but if there is ever an update i have to update first on the launcher and the after i press launch it has to update for the new log in screen too.

It sounds like something is blocking your patcher from transitioning you over to the updated version.  I want to help, but need more info though!  Are you getting any error messages when trying to update?  What are you seeing?
